tooltip.Y-CPG: Implemented - An organization has implemented and continues to maintain the recommended actions, or a suitable alternative, necessary to achieve the stated outcome.
tooltip.I-CPG: In Progress - An organization is in the process of implementing the recommended actions within a goal, or a suitable alternative, to achieve the stated outcome.
tooltip.S-CPG: Scoped - An organization has identified the full set of required activities required to meet the stated outcome of a goal.
tooltip.N-CPG: Not Implemented - An organization has no immediate plans to implement the recommended actions for a goal.
tooltip.LI-C2M2: Largely Implemented - Complete, but with a recognized opportunity for improvement
tooltip.PI-C2M2: Partially Implemented - Incomplete; there are multiple opportunities for improvement
tooltip.NI-C2M2: Not Implemented - Absent; the practice is not performed by the organization
tooltip.requires-review: One or more controls in this category requires further review.
